short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your tasks using the Eisenhower Matrix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Prioritize Task Extension" is a productivity tool designed to help users manage and prioritize their tasks effectively. This Chrome extension implements the Eisenhower Matrix, a time management technique that categorizes tasks based on their importance and urgency.

Key features of this extension include:

A clean, minimalist interface that displays the four quadrants of the Eisenhower Matrix.
Ability to add tasks to each quadrant (Important & Urgent, Important & Not Urgent, Not Important & Urgent, Not Important & Not Urgent).
Task persistence using Chrome's storage API, allowing users to save and retrieve their tasks across browser sessions.
A visually appealing design with soft gradients and a pastel color palette, creating a pleasant user experience.
Responsive layout that adapts to different screen sizes within the Chrome browser.
This extension aims to help users focus on what truly matters by providing a simple yet effective way to organize and visualize their tasks. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone looking to improve their time management skills, this Prioritize Task Extension offers a straightforward solution to boost productivity and make informed decisions about task priorities.
